titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-984, by Mr. Sessions.

It shall be in order at any time on or before the legislative day of Friday, October 20, 2000, for the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules, provided that the object of any such motion is announced from the floor at least 90 minutes before the motion is offered. H. Res. 615 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 311.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 640, H. Res. 633 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 10/17/2000--Introduced. Provides for the consideration of motions to suspend the rules. Lays H.Res.615 on the table.
